verses.text_plain: The elder to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not only I, but also all who know the truth,
verses.verse_html: 1 aThe elder to the elect lady and her children, bwhom I love in truth, and not only I, but also all who cknow dthe truth,

verses.text_plain: because of the truth that abides in us and will be with us forever:
verses.verse_html: 2 ebecause of the truth that abides in us and will be with us forever:

verses.text_plain: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Father’s Son, in truth and love.
verses.verse_html: 3 fGrace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Father’s Son, in truth and love.

verses.text_plain: I rejoiced greatly to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as we were commanded by the Father.
verses.verse_html: 4 gI rejoiced greatly to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as we were commanded by the Father.

verses.text_plain: And now I ask you, dear lady — not as though I were writing you a new commandment, but the one we have had from the beginning — that we love one another.
verses.verse_html: 5And now I ask you, dear lady— hnot as though I were writing you a new commandment, but the one we have had from the beginning— ithat we love one another.

verses.text_plain: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments; this is the commandment, just as you have heard from the beginning, so that you should walk in it.
verses.verse_html: 6And jthis is love, that we walk according to his commandments; this is the commandment, just kas you have heard from the beginning, so that you should walk in it.

verses.text_plain: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who do not confess the coming of Jesus Christ in the flesh. Such a one is the deceiver and the antichrist.
verses.verse_html: 7For lmany deceivers mhave gone out into the world, nthose who do not confess the coming of Jesus Christ in the flesh. Such a one is the deceiver and the antichrist.

verses.text_plain: Watch yourselves, so that you may not lose what we have worked for, but may win a full reward.
verses.verse_html:
8Watch yourselves, oso that you may not lose what we ▼
▼Some manuscripts you
 have worked for, but qmay win a full reward.

verses.text_plain: Everyone who goes on ahead and does not abide in the teaching of Christ, does not have God. Whoever abides in the teaching has both the Father and the Son.
verses.verse_html: 9Everyone who goes on ahead and does not abide in the teaching of Christ, rdoes not have God. Whoever abides in the teaching shas both the Father and the Son.

verses.text_plain: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into your house or give him any greeting,
verses.verse_html: 10If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, tdo not receive him into your house or give him any greeting,

verses.text_plain: for whoever greets him takes part in his wicked works.
verses.verse_html: 11for whoever greets him utakes part in his wicked works.

verses.text_plain: Though I have much to write to you, I would rather not use paper and ink. Instead I hope to come to you and talk face to face, so that our joy may be complete.
verses.verse_html: 12 vThough I have much to write to you, I would rather not use paper and ink. wInstead I hope to come to you and talk face to face, xso that our joy may be complete.

verses.text_plain: The children of your elect sister greet you.
verses.verse_html: 13The children of your elect sister greet you.
